Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Grants free access and parking at state parks for active-duty military members and veterans
Summary: Grants free access and parking at state parks for active-duty military members and veterans upon showing an active-duty military or veteran's ID card.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.12, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to granting free access and parking at state parks for active-duty military members and veterans
